Container.Name: smokeping
Container.Overview: Smokeping(https://oss.oetiker.ch/smokeping/) keeps track of your network latency. For a full example of what this application is capable of visit UCDavis(http://smokeping.ucdavis.edu/cgi-bin/smokeping.fcgi).
